product_name: Topeak Hybrid Rocket MT Bike Pump - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Designed for high-volume mountain bike tires, the Hybrid Rocket MT Bike Pump combines the reliability of a mini pump with the rapid performance of a CO2 inflator in a single unit.
short_description: Designed for high-volume mountain bike tires, the Hybrid Rocket MT Bike Pump combines the reliability of a mini pump with the rapid performance of a CO2 inflator in a single unit.
